metadata.title: CVE-2021-47296 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: KVM:PPC: Fix kvm_arch_vcpu_ioctl vcpu_load leak vcpu_put is not called if theuser copy fails. This can result in preempt notifier corruption andcrashes, among other issues.
